headline: Is Eversource Energy an Opportunity After a 12.6% Gain in 2025?
summary: Curious if Eversource Energy's stock is trading at a fair price right now? Let's take a closer look at where things stand to help you make a smarter investment decision. The stock has shown some ups and downs lately, with a -11.9% move in the last week and -11.7% over the last month. However, it remains up 12.6% year-to-date. Recent headlines have focused on the utility sector's volatility as market sentiment shifts around interest rates and regulatory developments. Speculation around grid...
